# Recharge Innate Magic, Greater (Spell)
## Overview
[[Transmutation Spells|Transmutation]]

**Level:** [[5th Level Alchemist Spells|Alchemist 5]], [[5th Level Bard Spells|Bard 5]], [[5th Level Cleric Spells|Cleric 5]], [[5th Level Druid Spells|Druid 5]], [[5th Level Inquisitor Spells|Inquisitor 5]], [[5th Level Magus Spells|Magus 5]], [[5th Level Sorcerer Spells|Sorcerer 5]], [[5th Level Witch Spells|Witch 5]], [[5th Level Wizard Spells|Wizard 5]]

**BoXM:** [[BoXM 9th-Level Cleric Spells List|Cleric 9]], [[BoXM 9th-Level Druid Spells List|Druid 9]], [[BoXM 9th-Level Wizard Spells List|Wizard 9]]

**Casting Time:** 1 standard action

**Components:** V, S

**Range:** Personal

**Target:** You

**Duration:** Instantaneous

**Saving Throw:** None

**Spell Resistance:** No

**Source:** The Mageâ€™s Tower website

You channel magic energy into your own aura, recharging your innate magic abilities. You regain one use of all 0-level through 5th-level spell-like abilities you can use as a result of a racial trait.
